text: unhen unake baapon ka beta karakar pukaaro. allaah ke yahaan yahee adhik nyaayasangat baat hai. aur yadi tum unake baapon ko na jaanate ho, to dharm mein ve tumhaare bhaee to hai hee aur tumhaare sahachar bhee. is silasile mein tumase jo galatee huee ho usamen tumapar koee gunaah nahin, kintu jisaka sankalp tumhaare dilon ne kar liya, usakee baat aur hai. vaastav mein allaah atyant kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
